Articles.Content: Well was having fun with KSP in career mode left the game for about 10 days come back and now it's unplayable because you have to unlock all the mechjeb2 essentials so I guess I'll quit playing till they make it fun again

Hey, you might want to take a look at [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98390-MechJeb-Embedded-Universal), it unlocks all of the MechJeb functions at the start if you install it correctly.

EDIT : Punted to Genderal Add-On Affairs.

Only problem you had with mechjeb was because your folder got updated . it was either a mod installed or game version installed, and that's why I always make a copy of my saved game. 

Mech jeb functions are unlocked roughly at the time you need them, but even basic mechjeb functions are unlocked at the start. No need for docking auto docking when you don't have docking ports
I agree with the title, therefore I play without it at all.
